casebody.data:
No. 10-6471. Eugene Miller, Petitioner v. John Lewis Marks, Jr., Judge, Circuit Court of West Virginia, 15th Judicial Circuit, et al. 562 U.S. 1132, 131 S. Ct. 976,

178 L. Ed. 2d 744,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 205. January 10, 2011.

Motion of petitioner for reconsideration of order denying leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied.
